thread.title: BRIEF-Wesbanco - Upon Termination Of Merger Agreement Under Some Circumstances, Farmers Capital May Be To Pay Co A Fee Of $12 Mln

title: BRIEF-Wesbanco - Upon Termination Of Merger Agreement Under Some Circumstances, Farmers Capital May Be To Pay Co A Fee Of $12 Mln
text:
Market News April 20, 2018 / 10:13 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Wesbanco - Upon Termination Of Merger Agreement Under Some Circumstances, Farmers Capital May Be To Pay Co A Fee Of $12 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - Farmers Capital Bank Corp: 
* WESBANCO - UPON TERMINATION OF MERGER AGREEMENT UNDER SOME CIRCUMSTANCES, FARMERS CAPITAL MAY BE TO PAY CO A FEE OF $12 MILLION - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2HhrrQk ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
